text: Charles Kay (born Charles Piff, 31 August 1930 - 8 January 2025) was an English actor. He was known for his stage roles with the Royal Shakespeare Company. Kay was known for his roles in Jennie: Lady Randolph Churchill, Fall of Eagles, I, Claudius, The Devils Crown, To Serve Them All My Days, By the Sword Divided, Fortunes of War, Rumpole of the Bailey, The Citadel, Edge of Darkness, The Darling Buds of May, Jonathan Creek, Hetty Wainthropp Investigates, Holby City, Midsomer Murders and The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes story "The Creeping Man". Kay died on 8 January 2025, at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2025 deaths Category:English stage actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Warwickshire
title: Charles Kay
